bibl.author: D.M. Robathan

bibl.title: Compositiones Variae from Codex 490, Biblioteca Capitolare, Lucca, Italy. An Introductory Study. (Illinois Studies in Language and Literature. 23, 3.)
bibl.author: Johnson, R.P.

bibl.seg: C.R. par D.M. Robathan, Classical Weekly 33 (1940) p. 147: "Johnson cites six parallel passages which indicate a close relationship between the papyri (Leyde X and Holmiensis) and the eighth-century treatise."
